sentences.sContent: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.sContent_eng: It takes about 150 days to grow out a full length fingernail.
sentences.sCn: 大约150天的时间就可以长一个完整的指甲出来。

sentences.sContent: The seal on the frosted bottle of Zubrowka was broken with a click—of plectrum on fingernail.
sentences.sContent_eng: The seal on the frosted bottle of Zubrowka was broken with a click—of plectrum on fingernail.
sentences.sCn: 齐白露加酒磨砂瓶上的封蜡咔哒一声被手指甲上的拔子启开。

sentences.sContent: Even those parents who seemed hard and demanding would just melt at the thought of their child in tears over a failed test or a broken fingernail.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even those parents who seemed hard and demanding would just melt at the thought of their child in tears over a failed test or a broken fingernail.
sentences.sCn: 即使看上去强硬而又苛求的家长，一想到他们的子女因考试不及格或弄破了手指而掉眼泪的时候，也会立即融化。

words.tran: 指法；用指摸弄；手指弹奏；指法符号；细绒线
用手指触摸；指出；谴责；用指弹奏（finger的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the hard flat part that covers the top end of your finger
